masks.unlockMessage: You have unlocked the Basic Mask! This mask reveals base platforms.

masks.description: Reveals traps and allows time slowdown by 3x.
masks.unlockMessage: You have unlocked the Trap Mask! This allows you to slow down time briefly. Different masks will also let you see different objects! Traps will affect you regardless of visibility.

masks.description: Shoot ropes to nodes and swing across gaps.
masks.unlockMessage: You have unlocked the Rope Mask! This mask allows you to shoot ropes to nodes and swing across gaps.

masks.description: Phase through special blocks for a 1s. 5s Cooldown.
masks.unlockMessage: You have unlocked the Phase Mask! This mask allows you to phase through special, yellow tinted blocks for a short time. It has infinite uses but a 5 second cooldown. Phase blocks and traps still hit you regardless of visibility.
